37 // The SeamPair elements own their SEAMs and delete them upon destruction.
38 using SeamPair = tesseract::KDPtrPairInc<float, SEAM>;
39 using SeamQueue = tesseract::GenericHeap<SeamPair>;
40 
41 using SeamDecPair = tesseract::KDPtrPairDec<float, SEAM>;
42 using SeamPile = tesseract::GenericHeap<SeamDecPair>;
